column4: hi, im having trouble with my external harddrive, after i tried to format it using Gparted it disappeared and now i cant find it even though its running an plugged in, any suggestions?! (running 10.04 netbook remix))

im having trouble with my external harddrive, after i tried to format it using Gparted it disappeared and now i cant find it even though its running an plugged in, any suggestions?! (running 10.04 netbook remix))
was the device detected? what does sudo fdisk -l say.
is as the hard drive isnt pluggedin
I guess /dev/sdb is your external hard drive, looks like there are no partitions on it
jatt: weird i found the drive on gparted altough i checked it already... but now when i try to format it to FAT32 i get an error msg :S
the last msg was when i tried it through GUI, running ur command i terminal resluted in this msg "Inhibit all polling failed: Only uid 0 is authorized to inhibit the daemon"
are you running gparted with sudo?
then i get the error msg "can't have overlapping partions"
